thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: U.S. Government Bonds Fall After Rising Wages Signal Inflation Risks

author: Daniel Kruger
title: U.S. Government Bonds Fall After Rising Wages Signal Inflation Risks

organizations.name: u.s. government bonds fall after rising wages signal inflation risks

text:
U.S. government bonds fell Friday after a Labor Department report showing solid wage gains in January signaled that a tight labor market is starting to produce pressure for higher inflation.
The yield on the benchmark 10-year note rose to 2.832%, according to Tradeweb, from 2.773% Thursday. Bond prices fall as yields rise.
Wage growth accelerated,...
